name: Feet to Face
description: Smush your feet on their face
message: %USER% rubs %USER_PRONOUN_THEIR% feet up and down %TARGET%'s head.
user_messages: You let you feet dangle over %TARGET%'s face, daring %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEM% to meet them.
You press your toes to %TARGET%'s cheeks, tracing teasing circles on %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEM%.
You smother %TARGET%'s face with your feet, pressing into %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEM%.
You rub up and down upon %TARGET%'s head with your feet.
You give a tender massage %TARGET%'s face using your feet.
target_messages: %USER% hovers %USER_PRONOUN_THEIR% toes just above your face, teasing you with them.
Both sides of your vision are blocked off as your cheeks are smushed beneath %USER%'s soles. %USER% shoves them around in small circles.
Your face is covered by %USER%'s feet, %USER% applies a small amount of pressure.
Your head is rubbed up and down by %USER%'s feet. Your head tilts side to side with the motion.
%USER% gives your face a foot-massage.
